mapper.select: select user.id as userId, user.nickname, graph_info.url as avatar from user join graph_info on user.id = graph_info.item_id and graph_info.item_type = 1 where user.id = #{userId} and user.is_deleted = 0

select (select count(*) from post where post.user_id = #{userId} and post.is_deleted = 0) as postCount,
(select count(*) from post_like where post_like.post_id in (select post.id from post where post.user_id = #{userId} and post.is_deleted = 0)) as totalLikes

select post.id as postId, trip.name as tripName, graph_info.url, post.create_time from post join trip on trip.id = post.trip_id and post.user_id = #{userId} left join graph_info on trip.id = graph_info.item_id and graph_info.item_type = 2 where post.is_deleted = 0

select user.id as userId, user.nickname, graph_info.url as avatar from user left join graph_info on user.id = graph_info.item_id and graph_info.item_type = 1 where user.nickname like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') and user.is_deleted = 0
